item.title: Aspose.Tasks for Python via .NET 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Tasks for Python via .Net 24.1. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type TASKSNET-2948 Fix existing graphical indicators are not preserved when MPP is opened and then saved by Aspose.Tasks Enhancement TASKSNET-11067 Fix reading and writing of ExternalTaskId and ExternalTaskUid Bug TASKSNET-10822 Fix extra empty resource is shown when opening MPP9 file Bug TASKSNET-4874 Fix incorrect calculation of Rsc.
